snippet: The security contractor at the Y-12 nuclear weapons plant near Oak Ridge has been fired after three activists cut through fences this summer and vandalized a building that stored uranium.
abstract: B&W Y-12, managing contractor at the Y-12 nuclear weapons plant in Tennessee, fires security firm WSI Oak Ridge following criticism after July break-in by three anti-war protesters.
lead_paragraph: The security contractor at the Y-12 nuclear weapons plant near Oak Ridge has been fired after three activists cut through fences this summer and vandalized a building that stored uranium.

headline.main: Tennessee: Security Firm Is Fired Over Break-In at Weapons Plant
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Security Firm Is Fired Over Break-In at Weapons Plant
